statements: SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 2
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers'
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, supplier_address FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_contact LIKE '%john%'
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id > 5 ORDER BY supplier_name DESC
SELECT supplier_address, supplier_contact FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers'
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%Co%'
SELECT DISTINCT supplier_name FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_id ASC
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_address IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_contact_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, supplier_contact_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_address = '123 Main St';
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_total > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Supplies';
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT supplier_name, order_total FROM suppliers s JOIN orders o ON s.supplier_id = o.supplier_id WHERE o.order_total > 1000;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, total_price FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%Tech%'
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_contact IS NOT NULL;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50.00 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_price FROM orders WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY order_date ASC;

SELECT suppliers.supplier_name, products.product_name, orders.quantity FROM suppliers JOIN products ON suppliers.supplier_id = products.supplier_id JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 50;
SELECT order_id, order_date, customer_name, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity FROM order_details INNER JOIN products ON order_details.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_price, supplier_id FROM products WHERE product_price > 50;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_contact_number IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' AND total_amount < 1000 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, quantity FROM suppliers s JOIN products p ON s.supplier_id = p.supplier_id JOIN order_details od ON p.product_id = od.product_id WHERE od.quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM supplier;
SELECT name, address FROM supplier WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, name, description FROM product ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM order_item WHERE quantity > 10;

SELECT supplier.name, supplier_order.order_id, order.total_amount FROM supplier JOIN supplier_order ON supplier.supplier_id = supplier_order.supplier_id JOIN 'order' ON supplier_order.order_id = 'order'.order_id;
SELECT * FROM supplier ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, address FROM supplier WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT product_id, name, description, price FROM product WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;

SELECT supplier.name, order.total_amount FROM supplier JOIN supplier_order ON supplier.supplier_id = supplier_order.supplier_id JOIN 'order' ON supplier_order.order_id = 'order'.order_id WHERE 'order'.status = 'Pending';

SELECT order.order_id, order.order_date, sum(order_item.total_price) AS total_order_amount FROM 'order' JOIN order_item ON 'order'.order_id = order_item.order_id GROUP BY order.order_id HAVING total_order_amount > 500;
